name: Arab Prince Surfer East Runner
description:
Run along with the craziest scenarios in the East Runner as Arab Prince. Drag to jump or slide and to move left or right in the dessert. Avoid hitting obstacles in an endless runner. Run around the Arab City as a prince, Gather all the coins you can and customize your 4 princes of different empires. In East Runner Arab Prince Surfer, you can choose among 4 different Princes to play with. Also, you can customize your Prince of choice by purchasing different items. Try the most excited subway runner in east-themed Runner surfer, Run for fun as an Arab Prince, run as fast as you can. Intuitive controls to run left or right, jump in the sky to obtain more coins, excited slide to safety. Subway Runner is an Arab prince to test the ability to react quickly. It is a game designed to encourage children to develop their independent skills.
The gameplay is designed for all ages that bring fun, excitement, and the ability to react quickly. You can play with your friends and family.


The East Runner Store has lots of items to improve your performance. Get upgrades to improve your power-ups such as the magnet or the boots.

FEATURES
========
- 4 characters of Arab Prince for you to choose
- Grind tents and dessert with your cool crew of princes
- More great skins to change the looks of your favorite character
- Lots of obstacle-dodging fun
- Hoverboard Surfing
- Colorful & smooth graphics
- Rich background music and sound effects
- Easy one-touch controls and game-play
- Influent screen touch & gravity control
- Colorful and vivid HD graphics
- Lightning-fast swipe acrobatics
- Beautiful east style
- Paint powered jetpack
- Endless runner game Arab Surfer
- Jetpack flying
- Many types of traps, obstacles
- Turn the corner, not only run straight
- Upgrade your abilities or buy new characters
- Challenge and help your friends
- Collect coins for your Arab Prince
